info.description: This is the sipgate REST API documentation. We build our new applications on this API and we invite you to use it too.
info.title: sipgate API

get.summary: Returns all addresses with their corresponding addressIds
Returns address with their corresponding addressId

put.summary: Modify an address to change your location
put.description: Warning: Depending on your country of residence, a change of your address may lead to the deactivation of associated telephone numbers.

get.summary: Get all associated numbers for a given address
Get the active events for this account
Returns true if terms and conditions for app.sipgate.com have been accepted

put.summary: Accept/Revoke terms and conditions for app.sipgate.com

post.summary: Create a session token
post.description:
Use this session token in the Authorization header to access protected routes.
Example header:
Authorization: Bearer <token>

get.summary: Returns information about the logged in user

post.summary: Change device password

put.summary: Change the caller display of an external device.
Change the target number of an external device.

get.summary: Returns whether single row display setting is enabled or disabled for the given device

put.summary: Enable/Disable single row display setting for the given device

get.summary: Returns whether tariff announcement is enabled or disabled for the given device

put.summary: Enable/Disable tariff announcement for the given device

get.summary: Returns the caller ID for a group fax
Returns all phone numbers for a group fax

post.summary: Set routing for device to group

delete.summary: delete routing for device to group

get.summary: Returns all numbers routed to group
Returns information about the group voicemail

post.summary: Adds a quick dial number

put.summary: Changes number settings, e.g. route to endpoint

post.summary: Request a password change
Change the password

get.description:
Possible status codes:
100: Waiting for user fax
150: WBCI waiting for mail opt-in
160: WBCI opt-in hash generated
170: WBCI opt-in link clicked
200: Waiting for fax from current network operator
250: WBCI send
251: WBCI network error
252: WBCI EKP rejected
400: Porting accepted
450: Waiting for data exchange
451: Data exchange error
500: Porting complete
600: Porting cancelled

get.summary: Restrictions based on the users product
get.description: Get restrictions for actions the authenticated user can perform for himself or another user.

post.summary: Initiates a new call
post.description:
DeviceId is only required if the caller parameter is a phone number and not a deviceId itself.
Use callerId to set a custom number that will be displayed to the callee.

400.description:
User supplied invalid callee number
User supplied invalid caller number
DeviceId is required if caller is a phone number

403.description: User is not allowed to initiate call with given parameters

post.summary: Send FAX
Resend FAX
Send SMS

put.summary: Sets default device for given user

post.summary: Creates a new device for the user.
post.description: If you want to create a new register device the Restriction CAN_CREATE_REGISTER_DEVICE needs to be true for the specified userId.

post.summary: Creates a new external device for the user.
post.description: If you want to create a new external device the Restriction CAN_CREATE_EXTERNAL_DEVICE needs to be true for the specified userId.

post.summary: Creates a new mobile device for the user.
post.description: If you want to create a new mobile device the Restriction CAN_CREATE_MOBILE_DEVICE needs to be true for the specified userId.

post.summary: Creates a new register device for the user.
post.description: If you want to create a new register device the Restriction CAN_CREATE_REGISTER_DEVICE needs to be true for the specified userId.

post.summary: Activate a sim card
Order a new SIM card
Creates a new faxline for the user

get.summary: Returns the history of calls and voicemails
Returns a specific history entry by id

post.summary: Add a new call email notification
Add a new call sms notification
Add a new fax email notification
Add a new fax report email notification
Add a new fax sms notification
Add a new email notification for incoming sms
Add a new voicemail email notification
Add a new voicemail sms notification
Creates a new phoneline for the user

get.summary: Returns settings for block anonymous calls

put.summary: Sets settings for block anonymous calls

get.summary: Returns settings for busy on busy

put.summary: Sets settings for busy on busy

post.summary: set routing for device to phoneline

delete.summary: delete routing for device to phoneline

400.description: Forwarding settings could not be changed due to bad request

post.summary: Add parallel forwarding

400.description: Voicemail settings could not be changed due to bad request

post.summary: Upload your base64 encoded OGG/MP3/WAV greeting

get.summary: Returns all callerids for the short message service

post.summary: adds a callerid
verifies a callerid
Create a new OAuth 2.0 client

name.description: Name of the application the client is intended to use with

description.description: Short description of the application the client is intended to use with

redirectUris.description: Valid URI pattern a browser can redirect to after a successful login or logout (simple wildcards are allowed e.g. 'http://example.com/*')

webOrigins.description: Allowed CORS origins (simple wildcards are allowed e.g. 'http://*.example.com')

name.description: Name of the application the client is intended to use with

description.description: Short description of the application the client is intended to use with

redirectUris.description: Valid URI pattern a browser can redirect to after a successful login or logout (simple wildcards are allowed e.g. 'http://example.com/*')

webOrigins.description: Allowed CORS origins (simple wildcards are allowed e.g. 'http://*.example.com')

post.summary: Import contacts from CSV file
post.description:
CSV files should match the following format:
firstname,lastname,number
Ada,Lovelace,+4915799912345
Alan,Turing,+4915799912345

post.summary: Import contacts from Google

get.summary: List all calls currently in progress

post.summary: Start playing a new announcement to all participants
post.description: Currently the sound file needs to be a mono 16bit PCM WAV file with a sampling rate of 8kHz. MP3 conversion example: mpg123 --rate 8000 --mono -w output.wav input.mp3

post.summary: Send DTMF tone sequences to all participants

put.summary: Start or stop a call recording

post.summary: Transfer call

url.description: The URL pointing to the announcement WAV file.

alias.example: Mobile phone phone of Grace Hopper

name.description: Name of the application the client is intended to use with

description.description: Short description of the application the client is intended to use with

redirectUris.description: Valid URI pattern a browser can redirect to after a successful login or logout (simple wildcards are allowed e.g. 'http://example.com/*')

webOrigins.description: Allowed CORS origins (simple wildcards are allowed e.g. 'http://*.example.com')

phoneNumber.description: Participants phone number (can be empty for various reasons, e.g. anonymous participant)

xmlError.example: Response does not have content type application/xml

announcement.description: Announce recording start/stop to all participants

message.example: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consetetur sadipscing elitr, sed diam nonumy eirmod tempor invidunt ut labore et dolore magna aliquyam erat, sed diam voluptua.

attended.description: The transfer is attended or blind

scopes.sessions:write: Initiate calls, send faxes, send SMS
